message: www.thewinstreak.com - Predict sports results and win $100 gift cards to Amazon. I'd love to get your feedback. I appreciate it!
Does it already work? I cannot select any sport.
@zokiboy yea i thought it was a bug but you have to register to pick the sports it is an ok site, nothing different from bulldog
@PistolPeteX8 It would be useful to get a message that I need to register. I thought the site isn't working and left.
@PistolPeteX8 it is a betting site, you can do sports betting and more, you can bet on tv shows, you can bet on anything
Ah I see. Except there's no betting on our site. It's all free.
Yes, you have to register to make the predictions. What is bulldog?
Same here.  Reading left to right, its not apparent that you have to register in order to take step 1.

special offer for those people signing up from convore - use www.thewinstreak.com/sign_up/bonus to start with an automatic 3 match winning streak in category and get a big headstart on the competition
